answers.prompt: the ability to access things humans need in order to live happy and healthy lives
the ability to access education and health services
having enough money to buy goods and services
Enabling happiness and satisfaction in a measurable way
Connecting health and exercise in a digital way
Being aware of the impact that digital technologies have on our health and wellbeing

questions.prompt: On average, how many hours do you think teens spend on social media platforms a year?
Which of the following Google AI features helps a customer in achieving better battery life?
Everything that is posted online is saved for how long?

answers.prompt: Taking a selfie of your shoes
A trail of everything you do on the Internet
Having a blog and a Facebook page

questions.prompt: What CAN you share to a stranger over the internet?

answers.prompt: None of the above. Never give out personal information to someone you do not know.

questions.prompt: What is a good way to maintain a positive digital footprint?

answers.prompt: Only post things that you would want everyone to see

questions.prompt: True or False? Private information can be copied and sent to anyone.
True or False? Anything you do online leaves a permanent record.
What is said to be the number one factor that has increased mental health issues amongst youth?
What are essential elements for digital wellbeing? (select all correct answers)

answers.prompt: When using digital technologies if I wear glasses while using them I don't have to take breaks
Use digital tools in pursuit of my personal goals (eg health and fitness) and to participate in social and community activities
Look after my personal health, safety, relationships and work-life balance in digital settings
Act safely and responsibly in digital environments such as social media platforms

questions.prompt: What are some of the features to help assist with personal wellbeing on a digital device? (select all appropriate answers)

answers.prompt: Wind down - Do not disturb (Night time)
Ability to turn on/off blue light screen filter
In app feature "You are all caught up" with news feed
